# Interoperability with other Hi-C packages in R

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| results: "hide"
#| message: false
#| warning: false
source("_common.R")
suppressPackageStartupMessages({
    library(HiContactsData)
    library(HiContacts)
    library(HiCExperiment)
})
```

## Coercing HiCExperiment objects

```{r}
hic <- import(
    CoolFile(HiContactsData('yeast_wt', 'mcool')), 
    focus = 'II', 
    resolution = 2000
)
```
